ItemConcept: Qualification for immigration: speak country's official language
Introduction text:
Žmonės iš kitų šalių atvyksta gyventi į Lietuvą dėl skirtingų priežasčių. Vieni dėl to, kad iš čia kilę. Kiti
čia atvyksta dirbti arba pas savo šeimas. Dar kiti atvyksta, nes jaučia grėsmę. Taigi keletas pirmų
klausimų šia tema.

Mensen komen om verschillende redenen vanuit andere landen in Nederland wonen. Sommigen hebben voorouderlijke banden.

ItemConcept: Perception of life as a whole (method 1)
Introduction text:
The next questions ask how you feel about different parts of your life. 
Please take into account the last year and what you expect in the near future. If your feelings are on the good side, I’ll ask you whether you feel “delighted”, “`pleased” or just “mostly satisfied”. If your feelings are on the bad side, I’ll ask you whether you feel “terrible”, “unhappy”, or just “mostly dissatisfied”. If your feelings are really mixed, just say so.
Request for answer text:
How do you feel about your life as a whole? Do you feel good, bad, or mixed?
Would you say you feel delighted, pleased or just mostly satisfied (with your life as a whole)?

3. Just mostly dissatisfied
4. Mixed
5. Just mostly satisfied
6. Pleased
7. Delighted

ItemConcept: Perception of life as a whole (method 2)
Introduction text: Please tell me the answer with seems to fit your situation, taking into account the last year and what you expect in the near future. I’ll ask you to give me a number from one to seven that describes how you feel – “one” stands for “completely dissatisfied”, and “seven” for “completely satisfied”. If you are neutral, or right in the middle, answer “four”. So the lower numbers 3, 2, and 1 show how dissatisfied you are. The higher numbers 5, 6, and 7, show how satisfied you are. Let’s start with a general question.
Request for answer text: How do you feel about your life as a whole? Give me a number from one to seven that describes how you feel
How do you feel about your health and physical condition?
How do you feel about housework – the work you need to do around your home?
How do you feel about how secure you are financially?

ItemConcept: Perception of life as a whole (method 3)
Introduction text: In order to answer these questions, think of a ladder with steps that go from zero at the bottom to ten at the top – five is the middle step in the ladder. At the bottom of the ladder are the very worst feelings you might reasonably expect to have. At the top of the ladder are the very best feelings you might reasonably expect to have. When I ask you a question about some part of your life, think of all the steps on the ladder and tell me which step corresponds to the way you feel. Please take into account the last year and what you expect in the near future.
Request for answer text: First, how do you feel about your life as a whole? What step on the ladder would that be?
How do you feel about your health and physical condition?
How do you feel about housework – the work you need to do around your home?
How do you feel about how secure you are financially?
